description.zh-cn: 位于台湾花东纵谷的公立研究型大学，由美国加州州立大学洛杉矶分校副校长牟宗灿返国创办，以美式校园与自由主义学风著称。是台湾解严与动员戡乱终止后，第一座民主时代的国立大学。
description.en: A public research university located in the Huadong Valley, Taiwan. Founded by Mou Tsung-tsan, former vice president of California State University, Los Angeles, it is known for its American-style campus and liberal academic atmosphere. It was the first national university established in Taiwan's democratic era after the lifting of martial law and the end of the Period of Mobilization for the Suppression of Communist Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 国立东华大学创校校长，留美经济学家，美国加州大学戴维斯分校经济学博士。
description.en: Founding president of National Dong Hwa University, an economist who studied in the United States, with a Ph.D. in Economics from the University of California, Davis.

nodes.id: 加利福尼亚州立大学洛杉矶分校

zh-cn: 加利福尼亚州立大学洛杉矶分校
加州州立大学洛杉矶分校

description.zh-cn: 位于美国加利福尼亚州洛杉矶的公立大学。
description.en: A public university in Los Angeles, California, USA.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院长，于1989年宣布将在东台湾成立第一座综合型国立大学。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as Premier. In 1989, he announced the establishment of the first comprehensive national university in Eastern Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任教育部长，负责国立东华大学的设校案。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China, who served as Minister of Education and was responsible for the establishment of National Dong Hwa University.

description.zh-cn: 台湾诗人、散文家、评论家、翻译家、学者。参与创办国立东华大学，并担任人文社会科学学院创院院长。
description.en: A Taiwanese poet, essayist, critic, translator, and scholar. He participated in the founding of National Dong Hwa University and served as the founding dean of the College of Humanities and Social Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 前身为台湾省立花莲师范学校，于2008年与国立东华大学合并。
description.en: Formerly known as Taiwan Provincial Hualien Normal School, it merged with National Dong Hwa University in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 美国建筑师，后现代主义建筑之父，耶鲁大学建筑学院院长。其设计蓝图被选为国立东华大学主校区的设计方案。
description.en: An American architect, a father of postmodern architecture, and dean of the Yale School of Architecture. His design blueprint was selected for the main campus of National Dong Hwa University.

description.zh-cn: 国立东华大学第二任校长，留美化学家。
description.en: The second president of National Dong Hwa University, a chemist who studied in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 国立东华大学第三任校长，留美超导物理学家。
description.en: The third president of National Dong Hwa University, a superconductivity physicist who studied in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 2014年在台湾发生的一场学生运动，起因于立法院审查《海峡两岸服务贸易协议》的程序争议。
description.en: A student movement that took place in Taiwan in 2014, sparked by procedural controversies over the legislative review of the Cross-Strait Service Trade Agreement.

description.zh-cn: 2024年4月3日发生在台湾花莲县附近海域的强烈地震，对国立东华大学造成了严重的财产损失。
description.en: A strong earthquake that occurred off the coast of Hualien County, Taiwan on April 3, 2024, causing severe property damage to National Dong Hwa University.

description.zh-cn: 国立东华大学校友、立法委员。在2024年花莲地震后，呼吁教育部支持母校重建。
description.en: An alumna of National Dong Hwa University and a legislator. After the 2024 Hualien earthquake, she called on the Ministry of Education to support the reconstruction of her alma mater.

description.zh-cn: 台湾漫画家，在2024年花莲地震后义卖作品，将所得捐赠给国立东华大学用于重建。
description.en: A Taiwanese cartoonist who, after the 2024 Hualien earthquake, sold his artworks for charity and donated the proceeds to National Dong Hwa University for reconstruction.

description.zh-cn: 台中市长，在2024年花莲地震后捐出半个月薪水以支持国立东华大学重建。
description.en: The Mayor of Taichung, who donated half a month's salary to support the reconstruction of National Dong Hwa University after the 2024 Hualien earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 台湾流行歌手、音乐家。在2024年花莲地震后，与妻子昆凌共同捐款支持国立东华大学重建。
description.en: A Taiwanese pop singer and musician. After the 2024 Hualien earthquake, he and his wife Hannah Quinlivan jointly donated money to support the reconstruction of National Dong Hwa University.

description.zh-cn: 台湾女艺人，周杰伦的妻子。在2024年花莲地震后，与丈夫周杰伦共同捐款支持国立东华大学重建。
description.en: A Taiwanese actress and the wife of Jay Chou. After the 2024 Hualien earthquake, she and her husband Jay Chou jointly donated money to support the reconstruction of National Dong Hwa University.

en: National Museum of Marine Biology and Aquarium

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾屏东县车城乡的海洋生物学博物馆，与国立东华大学合作成立海洋科学学院。
description.en: A marine biology museum located in Checheng, Pingtung County, Taiwan, which collaborated with National Dong Hwa University to establish the College of Marine Sciences.

nodes.id: 国立东华大学海洋科学学院

zh-cn: 国立东华大学海洋科学学院

description.zh-cn: 由国立东华大学与国立海洋生物博物馆共同创立的学院，于2022年与环境学院整合为环境暨海洋学院。
description.en: A college jointly founded by National Dong Hwa University and the National Museum of Marine Biology and Aquarium. It was merged with the College of Environmental Studies to form the College of Environmental and Ocean Sciences in 2022.

nodes.id: 国立东华大学环境学院

zh-cn: 国立东华大学环境学院

description.zh-cn: 国立东华大学的学院之一，于2022年与海洋科学学院整合为环境暨海洋学院。
description.en: A college of National Dong Hwa University, which merged with the College of Marine Sciences to form the College of Environmental and Ocean Sciences in 2022.

nodes.id: 国立东华大学环境暨海洋学院

zh-cn: 国立东华大学环境暨海洋学院
en: College of Environmental and Ocean Sciences

description.zh-cn: 国立东华大学的学院之一，于2022年由原环境学院和海洋科学学院整合而成。
description.en: A college of National Dong Hwa University, formed in 2022 by the merger of the former College of Environmental Studies and College of Marine Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的教育行政主管机关。
description.en: The ministry of the Republic of China that is responsible for incorporating educational policies and managing public schools.

nodes.id: 国立东华大学与国立花莲教育大学并校案

zh-cn: 国立东华大学与国立花莲教育大学并校案

description.zh-cn: 指2008年国立东华大学与国立花莲教育大学合并的事件。
description.en: Refers to the event of the merger between National Dong Hwa University and National Hualien University of Education in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的国家最高学术研究机关。
description.en: The national academy of the Republic of China.

nodes.id: 人工智慧普适研究中心

zh-cn: 人工智慧普适研究中心

description.zh-cn: 由中华民国科技部成立的四大AI研究中心之一，由多所大学与研究院共同组成，主要研究人工智慧技术在真实场景之应用。
description.en: One of the four major AI research centers established by the Ministry of Science and Technology of the Republic of China, composed of several universities and research institutes, focusing on the application of AI technology in real-world scenarios.

nodes.id: 人工智慧制造系统研究中心

zh-cn: 人工智慧制造系统研究中心
en: Artificial Intelligence for Intelligent Manufacturing Systems Research Center

description.zh-cn: 由中华民国科技部成立的四大AI研究中心之一，主要研究人工智慧应用于工业工程、运筹管理之学术中心。
description.en: One of the four major AI research centers established by the Ministry of Science and Technology of the Republic of China, focusing on the application of artificial intelligence in industrial engineering and logistics management.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的国立大学。
description.en: A national university in Taipei, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾嘉义县的国立大学。
description.en: A national university in Chiayi County, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾新竹市的国立研究型大学。
description.en: A national research university in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 和硕联合科技董事长，捐助成立“杨牧文学讲座基金会”并赠予东华大学“杨牧书房”。
description.en: Chairman of Pegatron. He donated to establish the 'Yang Mu Literary Lecture Foundation' and gifted the 'Yang Mu Study Room' to National Dong Hwa University.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国首位奥运跆拳道金牌得主，曾任国立东华大学跆拳道指导教练。
description.en: The first Olympic taekwondo gold medalist from the Republic of China, formerly served as the taekwondo coach at National Dong Hwa University.

description.zh-cn: 北美洲的国家。
description.en: A country in North America.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华民国行政院长李焕宣布将在东台湾成立第一座综合型国立大学，即后来的国立东华大学。
description.en: Lee Huan, then Premier of the Republic of China, announced the establishment of the first comprehensive national university in Eastern Taiwan, which later became National Dong Hwa University.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华民国教育部长毛高文负责国立东华大学的设校案。
description.en: Mao Kao-wen, then Minister of Education of the Republic of China, was responsible for the project to establish National Dong Hwa University.

description.zh-cn: 极力延揽时任美国加利福尼亚州立大学洛杉矶分校副校长牟宗灿担任国立东华大学的创校校长。
description.en: Actively recruited Mou Tsung-tsan, then Vice President of California State University, Los Angeles, to serve as the founding president of National Dong Hwa University.

description.zh-cn: 牟宗灿辞去美国教职返国创办国立东华大学，并担任首任校长。
description.en: Mou Tsung-tsan resigned from his teaching position in the United States to return to Taiwan and found National Dong Hwa University, serving as its first president.

description.zh-cn: 杨牧是参与国立东华大学创建过程的北美华裔教授之一。
description.en: Yang Mu was one of the North American Chinese professors who participated in the founding process of National Dong Hwa University.

description.zh-cn: 其设计的蓝图在国立东华大学主校区的国际设计竞图中入选，深刻影响了校园的建筑风格与规划。
description.en: His design blueprint was selected in the international design competition for the main campus of National Dong Hwa University, profoundly influencing the campus's architectural style and planning.

relationships.target: 国立东华大学与国立花莲教育大学并校案

description.zh-cn: 在中华民国教育部25亿新台币注资支持下，国立东华大学与国立花莲教育大学于2008年正式合并。
description.en: With the support of a NT$2.5 billion investment from the Ministry of Education of the Republic of China, National Dong Hwa University and National Hualien University of Education officially merged in 2008.

relationships.source: 国立东华大学与国立花莲教育大学并校案

description.zh-cn: 国立花莲教育大学并入国立东华大学，不再作为独立实体存在。
description.en: National Hualien University of Education was merged into National Dong Hwa University and ceased to exist as an independent entity.

relationships.target: 国立东华大学海洋科学学院

description.zh-cn: 与国立海洋生物博物馆共同创立海洋科学学院。
description.en: Co-founded the College of Marine Sciences with the National Museum of Marine Biology and Aquarium.

relationships.target: 国立东华大学海洋科学学院

description.zh-cn: 与国立东华大学共同创立海洋科学学院。
description.en: Co-founded the College of Marine Sciences with National Dong Hwa University.

relationships.target: 国立东华大学环境暨海洋学院

description.zh-cn: 将原环境学院与海洋科学学院整合，成立环境暨海洋学院。
description.en: Established the College of Environmental and Ocean Sciences by merging the former College of Environmental Studies and College of Marine Sciences.

relationships.target: 国立东华大学环境学院

description.zh-cn: 原环境学院于2022年被整合进新成立的环境暨海洋学院。
description.en: The former College of Environmental Studies was merged into the newly established College of Environmental and Ocean Sciences in 2022.

relationships.target: 国立东华大学海洋科学学院

description.zh-cn: 原海洋科学学院于2022年被整合进新成立的环境暨海洋学院。
description.en: The former College of Marine Sciences was merged into the newly established College of Environmental and Ocean Sciences in 2022.

description.zh-cn: 时任国立东华大学校长吴茂昆发布公开信，支持学生参与太阳花学运，成为全台湾大学校长中的先例。
description.en: Wu Maw-kuen, then president of National Dong Hwa University, issued an open letter supporting students' participation in the Sunflower Student Movement, setting a precedent among university presidents in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 地震导致国立东华大学理工学院发生火灾，并对图书馆、宿舍等设施造成严重损坏，财物损失近20亿新台币。
description.en: The earthquake caused a fire at the College of Science and Engineering of National Dong Hwa University and severe damage to facilities such as the library and dormitories, with financial losses close to NT$2 billion.

description.zh-cn: 作为东华大学校友及立法委员，在2024年花莲地震后，公开呼吁并希望教育部能全力支持母校的重建经费。
description.en: As an alumna of National Dong Hwa University and a legislator, she publicly urged and hoped that the Ministry of Education would fully support the reconstruction funds for her alma mater after the 2024 Hualien earthquake.

description.zh-cn: 在2024年花莲地震后，义卖19幅艺术作品，并将全部所得捐赠给国立东华大学用于灾后重建。
description.en: After the 2024 Hualien earthquake, he held a charity sale of 19 art pieces and donated all proceeds to National Dong Hwa University for post-disaster reconstruction.

description.zh-cn: 在2024年花莲地震后，捐出半个月薪水以支持国立东华大学的重建工作。
description.en: After the 2024 Hualien earthquake, she donated half a month's salary to support the reconstruction efforts of National Dong Hwa University.

description.zh-cn: 在2024年花莲地震后，与妻子昆凌共同捐款一百万新台币，以帮助国立东华大学重建。
description.en: After the 2024 Hualien earthquake, he and his wife Hannah Quinlivan jointly donated NT$1 million to help with the reconstruction of National Dong Hwa University.

description.zh-cn: 在2024年花莲地震后，与丈夫周杰伦共同捐款一百万新台币，以帮助国立东华大学重建。
description.en: After the 2024 Hualien earthquake, she and her husband Jay Chou jointly donated NT$1 million to help with the reconstruction of National Dong Hwa University.

description.zh-cn: 周杰伦与昆凌是夫妻关系。
description.en: Jay Chou and Hannah Quinlivan are spouses.

description.zh-cn: 捐献成立“杨牧文学讲座基金会”，并于2016年捐赠“杨牧书房”予国立东华大学。
description.en: Donated to establish the 'Yang Mu Literary Lecture Foundation' in 2013 and gifted the 'Yang Mu Study Room' to National Dong Hwa University in 2016.

description.zh-cn: 曾担任国立东华大学跆拳道队指导教练。
description.en: Formerly served as the coach for the Taekwondo team at National Dong Hwa University.

relationships.target: 人工智慧普适研究中心

description.zh-cn: 国立东华大学是科技部成立的人工智慧普适研究中心的八所创始成员之一。
description.en: National Dong Hwa University is one of the eight founding members of the Pervasive AI Research Labs established by the Ministry of Science and Technology.

relationships.target: 人工智慧制造系统研究中心

description.zh-cn: 国立东华大学于2019年7月加入科技部成立的人工智慧制造系统研究中心。
description.en: National Dong Hwa University joined the Artificial Intelligence for Intelligent Manufacturing Systems Research Center, established by the Ministry of Science and Technology, in July 2019.

description.zh-cn: 国立东华大学与中央研究院在民族学、台湾史、物理学等多个领域签有合作协定，进行学术合作。
description.en: National Dong Hwa University and Academia Sinica have signed cooperation agreements in various fields such as ethnology, Taiwan history, and physics for academic collaboration.

description.zh-cn: 两校签有学术合作协议，以促进校际交流与学术合作。
description.en: The two universities have signed an academic cooperation agreement to promote inter-university exchange and academic collaboration.

description.zh-cn: 两校签有学术合作协议，以促进校际交流与学术合作。
description.en: The two universities have signed an academic cooperation agreement to promote inter-university exchange and academic collaboration.

description.zh-cn: 两校签署学生交流协议，每学期相互提供交换生名额。
description.en: The two universities have signed a student exchange agreement, providing exchange student quotas for each other every semester.
